title: Leading baby wipes vendors in the U.S. 2016 , based on sales
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Million U.S. dollars in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Million U.S. dollars 494.4 is found at Company Private label and the minimum is found at Irish Breeze where Company is 4.4.
The difference of Million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Company is 490.0.
